message:
Guys, Does anyone have experience with BackboneJS .. ? I need to learn it in 2 Hrs
Could you please help me with understanding its structure ? if any of you can pass an article, short tutorial ... to understand how a BackboneJS  I'll be so grateful.
I'll continue my search and get back to you if anyone can help

Thanks guys.

data.message: The Tekpub video series was great for me. Now owned by PluralSight. Not 2 hours but you can try to be selective about what modules to watch.

Try this free book http://addyosmani.github.io/backbone-fundamentals/ if you are trying to build a single web page app you need to understand every thing about backbone because you will face a lot of problems during development so I think that two hours are not enough

Thanks guys for help
Mohamed Amr I ended up to it .. It's great .. But I had a question if 2 hrs r not enough .. What's the minimum time to learn backbone ?

Hisham El-Sheshtawy you are welcome.. For me first time I tried to learn backbone.js I tried Lynda tutorials to understand the big picture then I tried some code it takes one day for that. After that I read a book to understand the details it take about two days..I think that I am a lazy person so you can learn it quicker than me.
Hisham El-Sheshtawy you might need to use Marionette.js with backbone to organize the views it give you some classes like (layoutView ,collectionView, itemView) for me it was helpful.
+1 to Marionette if you get to put code rules. If existing coebase you might want to check as maybe they use it already.

1- Addy Osmani's book is the best resource.
2- Marionette is an indispensable add-on.
3- Stackoverlow is your best friend!
